src_text: Merero ya ga Jaanong1.

src_text: Motlakase
trg_text: Energy

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke puso go samagana le mathata a motlakase a nag Dikgato tseno tsa botlhokwa di tlhagola tsela ya go fokotsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase, go fetola lephata la motlakase le go dira gore setlwaedi sa go tlhaela motlakase e nne selo sa mo maloben
trg_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country s energy crisi The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy securit In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three month

src_text: Go tshegetsa mafaratlhatlha a motlakase le go thusa naga ya rona gore e se imelwe ke tlamelo ya motlakase, re tlhoka go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase ya set haba ka dimekawate di le 600 mo dikgweding di le tharo tse di tlan
trg_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand time Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity deman 2.

src_text: Malapa a ka nna le seabe mo go somareleng motlakase ka go tima mabone a a sa dirisiweng le didiriswa tsa motlakase tse di jang motlakase o montsi ka dinako tse motlakase o dirisiwang ka bonts Dikgwebo di rotloediwa go dirisa thekenoloji e e sa diriseng motlakase o montsi mo ditirong tsa tsona tsa tlhagiso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tsa go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakas 2.
trg_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the econom Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progres Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeri 3.

src_text: Operation Vulindlela
trg_text: Operation Vulindlela

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse kgatelopele e e dirilweng ka fa tlase ga Operation Vulindlela ya go tlosa dikgoreletsi mo maphateng a motlakase, a mafaratlhatlha a ditlhaeletsano, le a metsi le a bojanala mo go tsosolosenga ikonom
trg_text: The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and countr The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing secto

src_text: Go fitlheletswe diphetogo tsa ikonomi di le robongwe go tswa mo go di le 26, mme mo diphetogong di le 11 go na le kgatelopele e e namatshan Dikatlego di akaretsa go oketsa palo ya dilaesense tsa tlhagiso e e golaganeng le phatlalatso, go fetolelwa ga Bothati jwa Maemelakepe a Boset haba a Transnet go nna setlamo se se ikemetseng, go gololwa ga lenane le le sekasekilweng la dikgono tsa botlhokwa le tsenyotirisong ya tsamaiso ya e-Visa mo dinageng di le 14, go akarediwa mebaraka e megolo e ment hwa ya bajanala e tshwana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeri 3.
trg_text: They ended ninth overall with seven gold, nine silver and 11 bronze medalsSpringbok Women, for their win over Spain in their first of two Women s Winter Series test matches at Emirates Airline Park in JohannesburMs Ndavi Nokeri (23), for being crowned the new Miss South Africa 2022.Ms Ashleigh Buhai, for winning the 2022 AIG Women s Open and becoming the third South African woman to win a major gold championship Condolences Cabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of:

src_text: Go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Batho ba Bomme (GBVF)
trg_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng

src_text: Kabinete e gagamaditswe tota ke ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tsa mo malobeng tsa go betelelwa ga basadi ba le robedi kwa Krugersdorp, kwa Gauten Ditiragatso tseno tse di bosula le tsa go bogisa batho ba bomme di nyatsa botho ba ron Kabinete e akgotse gape le Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa ka go tshwara ka bonako babelaelwa ba le mmalwa malebana le tiragalo eno e e setlhog
trg_text: Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauten These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabri Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of a number of suspects in connection with the heinous crim

src_text: Kabinete e ikuetse mo baaging go dirisana le sepodisi ka go ba loma tsebe gongwe go ba begela ka ditiragalo tse di belaetsan Fa re dira mmogo, re ka dira gore mo metseng e re tswang kwa go yona basadi le bana ba rona ba nne ba babalesegil
trg_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activitie Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and childre

src_text: MoAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe o na le maikarabelo a go tsaya dikgato tsa molao kgatlhanong le ditlhokotseb Bega ditiragalo tsotlhe tse di amanang le GBVF kwa setei eneng sa mapodisi sa kgaolo e o nnang kwa go yona gongwe o letsetse nomoro ya mahala ya Crime Stop: mo go 08600 10111, gongwe o letsetse Tikwatikwe ya Boset haba ya go Lwantshana le GBVF: mog go 0800 428 428 gongwe o letsetse Mogala wa Thuso ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa ga Batho ba Bomme: mo go 0800 150 150.
trg_text: Every South African has a duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the la Report all GBVF-related incidents to a local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150 150.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi
trg_text: This year s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme:

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phatwe e tlotla basadi ba ba nnileng le seabe mo kgaratlhong ya kgololesego le basadi botlhe mo set habeng sa ron
trg_text: Women s Month The annual Women s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our societ

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi monongwaga e ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa:
trg_text: Under the theme:

src_text: Ditshwanelo le Maatlafatso ya Basadi mo Ikonoming le mo Set habeng: Re aga Botoka go Tokafatsa go Tsosologa ga Basadi .
trg_text: Women s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women s Improved Resilience .

src_text: Basadi ba feta 20 000 ba ba gwantetseng kwa Union Buildings kwa Pretoria ka la bo 9 Phatwe 1956 ba akgetse mo go netefatseng gore tekatekano ya bong le maatlafatso di tswelela go nna ditlapele tse botlhokwa mo Aforika Borweng wa temokeras
trg_text: The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains a key priority in a democratic South Afric Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in 1994.

src_text: Dikgato tsa bona tsa bopelokgale di rotloeditse basadi ka kakaretso go tsaya manno a a ba siametseng mo Palamenteng, mo pusong le mo set habeng, mme re tswelela go agelela mo ditswelelopeleng tseno fa e sale re bona kgololesego ka 199
trg_text: Leave no one behind , President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local government South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic condition

src_text: Segopotso sa Marikana
trg_text: Magesh

src_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phatwe 2022, puso e tshwaragane le naga yotlhe go ikgopotsa matlhotlhapelo a a diragetseng kwa Marikana kwa Bokone Bophirima ka ngwaga wa 2012.
trg_text: Marikana commemoration On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in 2012.

src_text: Kutlobotlhoko e e utlwilweng ke badiri, bamalapa a bona le set haba ka kakaretso, e tla nna e le mo hisetoring ya ron
trg_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our histor

src_text: Lenaneo la Nt hwafatso ya Marikana le tsentswe tirisong go aga se wa le go dira gore go nne le seemo se se kgontshang go tokafatsa matshelo a baagi ba Marikan Ngogola puso e duetse R176 milione e le tlhatswadiatla ya malapa a batswasetlhabelo mme go solofetswe gore dikgetse tse di setseng ga jaana tse di mo dikgatong tsa semolao di konosediwe kwa bokhutlong jwa Phatwe 2022.
trg_text: The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana communit Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August 2022.

src_text: Go neetswe batlholagadi ba Marikana matlo a le mmalwa a a nt hwafaditsweng le a a rekilweng mme a mangwe a tla konosediwa monongwag Porojeke ya matlo ya R700 milione e tla dira gore badiri ba meepo ba tlamelwe ka matlo a a nang le serit Go tlamelwa ka mafaratlhatlha a botlhokwa a loago go tokafatsa seemo sa botshelo sa baagi ba kwa meepong
trg_text: A number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this yea A R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housin Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communitie

src_text: Imbizo ya Moporesidente e e Tshwaretsweng kwa Gauteng e e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo mo Dikgaolong (DDM)
trg_text: Mr Adam Mthombeni as DDG: Intergovernmental Relations in the DPW

src_text: Go latela katlego ya di-Imbizo tsa Moporesidente di le tharo tse di neng di tshwaretswe kwa Bokone Bophirima, Foreisetata le Mpumalanga, ka tatelano ya tsona, Lekgotlatoropo la Kgaolo la Sedibeng kwa Gauteng le ne la amogela legato la bone ka Labotlhano, 12 Phatwe 2022.
trg_text: Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August 2022.

src_text: Ka fa tlase ga moono wa:
trg_text: Amongst the amendments

src_text: Se tlogele ope kwa morago , Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o ne a eteletse pele baemedi ba batlhankedibagolwane go tswa kwa pusong ya boset haba, ya porofense le ya selega MaAforika Borwa go tswa kwa maphateng a a farologaneng a ne a rotloediwa go dira mmogo kgatlhanong le seelo se se golang sa lehuma le khumanego tse di bakwang ke maemo a a gwetlhang a ikonom
trg_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with a view to fostering a state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemploymen

src_text: Kgaolo ya Sedibeng e nnile le tswelelopele ka go dirisa Kgaolo ya Ikonomi e e Kgethegileng ya Vaal River (SEZ), e e nang le bokgoni jwa go fetolela kgaolo eo, porofense le naga go nna ya madirelo gap Maikaelelo a Vaal River SEZ ke go amogela maphata a a latelang a botlhokwa: Vaal River Smart City e nt hwa, Kutla ya Green Hydrogen Innovation; kutla ya motekwane/khanabisi; tsamaiso ya dithoto tsa temothuo (agro-logistics); eroteropolisi; boemelafofanepotlana; thomelothoto ka difofane le lephata le le tsosolositsweng la tlhagiso ya tship
trg_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementatio The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed medi

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 4 go fitlha ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa:
trg_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme:

src_text: Go Diragatsa Dikgato tsa go Tshwaraganya Set haba go Dira gore Baagi ba nne le Seabe mo Ditiragalong tsa go tswa Baagi Thuso tse di Nang le Seabe mo Ikonoming , e kopantse batho botlhe ba ba amegang go tswa kwa dikhutlong tsotlhe tsa naga tse di nang le seabe mo mererong ya mothale ono, gore ba tle go dirisana mmogo le puso go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi mme gareng ga maikemisetso a mangwe a mantsi, le go batlela mekgatlho ya go ema baagi nokeng didirisiwa tsotlhe tse e di tlhokang go thusa baag
trg_text: Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities , brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objective

src_text: Samiti e sekasekane le dipegelo tsa dipuisano go tswa kwa diporofenseng di le robongwe malebana le dikgwetlho tsa tsona, tse di akareditseng tlamelo ya matlole, matsapa a melawanataolo, go fetola lekala la go tswa baagi thuso ka maikaelelo a go dira gore go nne le tirisanommogo magareng ga puso le mekgatlo ya baagi go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di amanang le lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatir
trg_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terroris

src_text: Kabinete e ikuetse kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi le mo baaging go nna le seabe se se tlhaga go netefatsa gore re aga isago e e botoka, jaaka go elediwa mo Leanong la Tlhabololo ya Naga: Mo ponelopeleng ya 2030.
trg_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build a better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision 2030.

src_text: Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi
trg_text: 1996 called TKZe

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi gore e tsenngwe tirison Leano leno le tsepamisitse mogopolo mo tirong e ntle ya ditshwantsho le dibidio; ya go bopa le go betla; ya dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le ya metlotlo; ya ditirelo tsa mebetlo le tsa boitlhamedi; ya go diragatsa le ya go keteka, go akarediwa le ya mmino, ya go phasalatsa le ya dikgatis
trg_text: Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processin The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Ac

src_text: Leano leno le tla tswela maphata ano mosola mo go direng gore re nne le lekala le le fetogileng le le kgonang go itlhamela le go itshimololela dilo le le tla tlhomphiwang mo lefatsheng le go gaisana le a mangwe mo lekaleng len Le tla tswela mosola intaseteri ya boitlhamedi ya Aforika Borwa gore e kgone go fitlhelela mebaraka ya ka fa nageng le ya dinaga tsa bodit habat hab
trg_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building a transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the spac It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international market 2.

src_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Nt hwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi a Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le a go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso
trg_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalitie

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng se wa tsa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Nt hwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi a Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le a go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyets Dikarolo tseno tota di mo karolong ya madi a dikadimo mo leanong len Mo dikarolong tseno, go tshitshintswe gore go atisewe paka ya go duelela madi a a adimilweng gore e tsamaelana le paka ya tse dingwe tsa dithoto tse di rekilweng ka t helete e Dikarolo tseno gape di tlhalosa seabe sa ditheo tsa dit helete tsa tlhabololo mo go adimeng dimasepala matlol
trg_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencie The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framewor

src_text: Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 o naya dimasepala dithata tsa go adima t helete ya ditshenyegelo tsa tson Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la ntlhantlha le amogetswe ke Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2000 go kaela Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Dit helete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
trg_text: proposed introducing a longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being finance The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalitie Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditur The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).

src_text: Maitlhomo a dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng se wa ke go dira gore baadimi ba bangwe ba bantsinyana mo mebasepaleng ba bone merokotso fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe di tswelela go se setise dintlha tse di botlhokwa tsa dikadimo tsa dimasepal 3.
trg_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowin 3.

src_text: Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara e Nngwe le e Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Dit helete wa 2022/23
trg_text: Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial yea Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats releas This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the countr The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter tw Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectivel 4.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara e Nngwe le e Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Dit helete wa 2022/23.
trg_text: Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 South Africa will host the Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 in Cape Town between 9 and 11 September 2022.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara e nngwe le e nngwe di ka phasaladiw Seno ke go fetola nako gore e se tshwane le ya mo ngwageng o o fetileng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa nag
trg_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative proces In 2020, the Constitutional Court declared Section 63 of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act of 1992 unconstitutional and suspended the invalidity to 17 December 2022 to provide for Parliament to correct the defec

src_text: Nako e e tshitshintsweng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi pele ga nako ke Phatwe 2022 malebana le kotara ya ntlha le Ngwanaitseele 2022 malebana le kotara ya bobed Dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone di tla phasaladiwa ka Tlhakole le Motsheganong 2023, ka tatelano ya tson 4.
trg_text: At the same time, they qualified for next year s FIFA women s World Cup to be jointly hosted by Australia and New Zealand from 20 July to 20 August 2023.Team South Africa, for winning 27 medals in various disciplines at the 2022 Commonwealth Games held in Birmingham, England from 28 July to 8 August 2022.

src_text: Go Khutlisa Seemo sa Boset haba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD)
trg_text: Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Nata

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse kgato ya go khutlisa Seemo sa Boset haba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD) jaaka e ne ya tsenngwa tirisong morago ga merwalela e e sentseng thata kwa Kapa Botlhaba le KwaZulu-Nata
trg_text: Ms Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe as Regional Executive Manager of the South African Social Security Agency in KwaZulu-Nata Enquiries:Ms Phumla Williams

src_text: NSoD e khutlile ka la bo 18 Phatwe 2022 go latela gore e atolosediwe nako ka la bo 18 Phukwi 2022.
trg_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July 2022.

src_text: Go atolosediwa nako gono e ne e le ka ntlha ya fa go ne go santse go na le tlhokagalo ya gore go tswelele go tshegetsa dikgato tse di leng teng tsa go samagana le ditiragalo tse di diragaditsweng ke dikarolo tsa puso go fokotsa le go samagana le ditlamorago tsa ditiragalo tsa ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo ka ntlha ya maemo a bosa kwa diporofenseng tse di amegilen
trg_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected province

src_text: Kabinete e dumelane gore maemo a ga jaana ga a sa tlhole a tlhoka gore go nne le dikgato tse di kgethegileng ka ntlha ya fa dikarolo tsa puso, lephata la poraefete le baagi ba tla kgona go netefatsa gore ba tsweletsa dikgato tsa go thusa, go busetsa sekeng le go aga se w
trg_text: Cabinet agreed that current circumstances no longer warrant the extraordinary measures as organs of state, the private sector and civil society will continue to ensure ongoing relief, recovery and reconstructio

src_text: Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo a Bodulo wa Ngwaga wa 2022
trg_text: the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo a Bodulo wa ngwaga wa 2020 o ka romelwa kwa Palamenteng gore o ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelel Kabinete ka Seetebosigo 2020 e ne ya letlelela gore molaotlhomo ono o ka romelwa lekgetlo le lengwe gape kwa baaging gore ba ntshe maikutlo a bona ka ga on
trg_text: Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2022 Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processin Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultatio The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng se wa di tla dira gore ditshwanelo tsa go nna le lefatshe e nne selo sa boammaruri se se sireleditsweng semolao ke Karolo ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996.
trg_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April 1994.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono o dira gore jaanong go kokoanngwa ga dipalopalo malebana le lotso, boset haba le boagi jwa batshodi ba ditshwanelo tsa lefatshe mo Aforika Borwa e nne selo se se kgonagalan Kgaolo eno e tla dira gore mo isagong go nne bonolo go kwala dipegelo tse di nepagetseng tsa boruni jwa lefatshe le tsa tshekatsheko ya lefatshe fa re lekola diphetogo mo go nneng beng ba lefatsh 2.
trg_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Afric This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownershi 2.

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Setheo sa Boset haba sa Mafaratlhatlha a Ditlamelo tsa Metsi (NWRIA) wa Ngwaga wa 2022
trg_text: Financial Matters Amendment Bill of 2022 Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill, 2022.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore Molaotlhomo wa NWRIA wa 2022 o ka phasaladiwa sebaka sa malatsi a le 90 gore set haba se ntshe maikutlo a sona ka ga on Molaotlhomo ono o tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe setheo sa NWRIA se se tla rwalang maikarabelo a go rulaganya, go tlamela ka dit helete le go tlhabolola mafaratlhatlha a metsi mo nagen Gape se tla bo se na le maikarabelo a go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a a leng teng a mets
trg_text: National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of 2022 Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for a period of ninety (90) day The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the countr It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructur The agency is to ensure a sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and a secure healthy environmen The agency will be set up as a Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).

src_text: Setheo seno se tla tshwanela ke go netefatsa gore go nna le tlamelo e e sa kgaotseng ya metsi, e e rebolang metsi ka go lekalekana le e e go tsamaisana le maitlamo a molaotheo a gore batho ba tshwanetswe go tlamelwa ka metsi le tikologo e e babalesegileng mme e itekanets Setheo seno se tla tlhomiwa go nna Setheo sa Puso ka fa tlase ga
trg_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectivel Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultatio 4.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Dit helete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa 2022
trg_text: Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of 2022 Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of 2022.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Dit helete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa 2022 o isiwe kwa Palamenten Molaotlhomo ono o baakanya Molao wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Dit helete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007).
trg_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).

src_text: Dikarolo tseno tse di kwalolotsweng se wa di laola maatla a dimasepala a go lefisa ditefiso tsa tlhabololo malebana le dikopo tsa tlhabololo ya lefatshe tse di neelwang dimasepal Dikarolo tseno di tla netefatsa gore dimasepala di dirisa ditefiso tseno kwa ntle ga go tsaya letlhakore, kwa ntle ga bofitlha le ka tshwanel Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2020 e neile tetla ya gore Molaotlhomo ono o ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo a bona ka ga on 4.
trg_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriag In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guil The Bill was published for public comment in February 2022.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Merero ya Dit helete wa Ngwaga wa 2022
trg_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: Banyana Banyana, for making history and winning South Africa s first ever Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), at the 2022 WAFCON finals held in Rabat, Morocco on Saturday, 23 July 2022.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Merero ya Dit helete wa Ngwaga wa 2022 o ka isiwa kwa Palamenten Molaotlhomo ono o tshitshinya gore Melao e le supa e kwalolwe se wa, e leng (1) Molao wa Letlole la Diphen ene la Ditheo tse di Dirang Tiro ya Mothale oo, wa ngwaga wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41, wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphen ene tsa Masole, wa ngwaga wa 1976 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphen ene tsa Badiri ba Puso wa ngwaga wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Khomi ene ya Dit helete le Taolo ya Matlole, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1996); (5) Molao wa Banka ya Lefatshe le Tlhabololo ya Temothuo, wa ngwaga wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Porofe ene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Porofe ene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2021, (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).
trg_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processin The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely (i) Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and (v) Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng se wa di akaretsa tse di leng ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Diphen ene tsa Masole wa 1996, tse di ka ga go akarediwa mo diphen eneng tsa masole balekane ba masole gore le bona ba natholelwe ditshiamelo tsa bona mme go tla tsewa gore seno se tla diragadiwa go tloga ka letlha la bo 27 Moranang 1994.
trg_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng se wa tsa melao ya diphen ene di tla dira gore ka gangwe balekane ba masole ba natholelwe merokotso ya diphen ene fa ba tswa mo kgolaganong ya lenyal
